Key Match Events: Jack Grealish scored the opening goal for England
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a stunning free-kick to double England's lead
Declan Rice added a third goal for England
Finland scored a consolation goal in the closing stages
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley made six changes after England's shock defeat to Greece
Post-Match Reflections: England's performance was coherent but concerns at the back remain
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Helsinki
